Philosophies

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Prof. Dr. Ueli Zahnd, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland
Gabriel Müller, Faculty of Theology, University of Basel, Switzerland (en)
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of philosophies, general subclasses, related classes, properties, and instances.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about philosophies
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

philosophies:Albertism
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Philosophy and theology based on the ideas of Albertus Magnus (before 1200 - 1280-11-15).

philosophies:
rdfs:label
Albertism (en)
Albertismus (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
philosophy:Philosophy

philosophies:Nominalism
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Philosophy stating that only individual things exist, denying the existence of universals and abstract objects.

philosophies:
rdfs:label
Nominalismus (de)
Nominalism (en)
rdfs:subClassOf
philosophy:Metaphysics

Properties

philosophies:adheringToThought
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a person to a philosophy the person adheres to.
rdfs:domain
human:Person
rdfs:isDefinedBy
philosophies:
rdfs:label
ist Anhänger von Philosophie (de)
adhering to philosophy (en)
rdfs:range
philosophy:Philosophy
rdfs:subPropertyOf
